page.title: 08Shops in Braunton
page.content: A friend & I surveyed five shops.The first shopkeeper interviewed was from {Squires newsagents.}Lots of Braunton people order newspapers from it, and there are two other newsagents in Braunton.{Tiki Surf shop}was set up in 1972.It has branches in 17 countries around the world.Sometimes over 1000 wetsuits are sold a week because there are many beaches nearby.{Slees,}a shop that sells garden & electrical goods used to be an ironmongers.On an average day 2 to 300 people use this shop.{Harpers}is a baker's.It is in the centre of Braunton & is so well known for it's bread someone from {Lynton}orders it!{John Patts}is a fruit shop along Caen Street in the centre of the village,it was set up in 1982.A lot of people use this shop.There are in fact,too many shops really for the villagers needs.
